name: Cat in a Bag S01:E37
description:
Your name is Shrodinger Cat. For the past 17 years you've been trying to infiltrate the most powerful criminal organization the world, The Fat Cat's Lootbag Dealer Mafia, with your best friend, Rodger Cat... But everything goes astray when your Lover, the Fat Cat's Daughter, goes missing...

Do you have what it takes to find her before the Fat Cat's goons turn you into cat food? Find out in this melodramatic crime drama I made in six weeks in the Game Jam course I'm taking at HUJI.

Credits:

Everything except sound effects: ME

Sound effects: freesound.org
